short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to share your listings with your agent, by browsing property listings on; Zillow , Realtor ,Redfin & Trulia!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to facilitate real estate agents as well as their clients, it will help them to share property listings using this app and collaborate seamlessly.
